cluster_classes.class_description: Positive social outcomes arising from social mediaâ€™s capacity to connect people, including overcoming physical distance, increasing overall connectivity, and enabling deeper, meaningful relationships.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: ability to connect regardless of physical distance, increased connectivity, and foster meaningful connections via social media

members.entity_name: ability to connect regardless of physical distance
members.entity_description: The capability of social media to link people even when they are geographically far apart.
Greater ability for people to connect and communicate with others through social media platforms.
Deeper, more genuine social relationships that can be supported via social media.

cluster_classes.class_description: Subjective experiences of emotional bonding and belonging among users, emphasizing feelings of closeness and community in social media contexts.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: real-time sharing of updates, photos, and thoughts fosters a sense of closeness and community among users

members.entity_description: Perceived emotional proximity and connection among social media users.
Feeling of belonging and social connection created among users on social media.

cluster_classes.class_description: People an individual maintains contact with via social media, including friends, family members, and acquaintances.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: stay in touch with friends, family, and acquaintances from all over the world

members.entity_description: Personal social connections that individuals keep in touch with via social media platforms.
Relatives and close kin that users communicate with using social media.
People known to an individual with whom they maintain contact through social media.

args.justification: This class captures positive social outcomes of social media connectivity (overcoming distance, enabling meaningful relationships), which fits within a broader Social Media Relationships & Connectedness group shared with related psychosocial and contact-structure classes.

This class focuses on subjective feelings of closeness and community in social media use, conceptually related to but distinct from connectivity and contact lists, so it should share the same Social Media Relationships & Connectedness class_group.

This class represents the concrete social contacts maintained via social media (friends, family, acquaintances), which sits alongside connectivity capabilities and subjective connectedness under a unified Social Media Relationships & Connectedness class_group.

This class represents the concrete social contacts maintained via social media (friends, family, acquaintances), which sits alongside connectivity capabilities and subjective connectedness under a unified Social Media Relationships & Connectedness class_group.
